# Beekeeping {#sec-culture-bees}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
The only things that Ukraine can export to Europe are nuts, straw and wool.
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/report/the-only-things-that-ukraine-can-export-to-europe-are/)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
Ukraine exports a lot, including honey. We owe modern beekeeping to Ukraine.
:::

Few people know this, but this story changed the world of beekeeping! üêù

[![Link to Petro Prokopovych on Wikipedia](../all_common_img/Wikipedia.png){height=1em}](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Petro_Prokopovych)

Until 1814, beekeepers destroyed their hives and killed the bees, until Ukrainian Petro Prokopovych invented a revolutionary collapsible hive! [^culture-ukraine-2] 

This was a real breakthrough, but unfortunately his name has been forgotten. But we remember and are proud!
